name: edge-builder
description:
Extract relationship edges from document content to build knowledge graph connections. Analyzes resources and identifies relationships to other entities, generating inline edges.

**Process:**
1. Analyze document content for entity mentions
2. Identify relationship types (references, authored_by, depends_on)
3. Optionally lookup existing entities using lookup_entity
4. Generate inline edges in standard format

**Common Relationship Types:**
- references: Document references another document
- authored_by: Document created by person/system
- depends_on: Technical dependency
- implements: Implementation of specification
- related_to: Generic relationship

edges.description: Array of inline edges extracted from the document
